title: Grammys 2026: Reba McEntire, Rex Linn and more couples bring date night to red carpet

title: Abuja Hospital Says Singer Ifunanya 'Nanyah' Nwagene Died Of Severe Neurotoxic Snake Bite, Not Lack Of Anti-Venom
desc: The Federal Medical Centre (FMC), Jabi, Abuja, has claimed that the death of 25-year-old Nigerian singer, Ifunanya Lucy Nwagene, popularly known as Nanyah, was not caused by the non-availability of anti-snake venom at the hospital. In a press statement released on Sunday by its Head of Clinical Service, Dr Bioku Muftau, the hospital dismissed the allegations, stating that Nwagene died from severe neurotoxic complications arising from a snake bite sustained on January 31, 2026, despite prompt and appropriate medical intervention.
